meanings.definition: The act of making something white.
meanings.sent1: The whitenings of the walls brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the whitenings of the clouds on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the sudden whitenings of a black hat.
meanings.sent4: The whitenings of the snow-covered landscape were like a blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: Her smile was as radiant as the whitenings of freshly washed sheets.

meanings.sent1: Over time, the whitenings of the fence were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The gradual whitenings of his hair showed his age.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected whitenings of the cat's fur surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The whitenings of the stars in the night sky were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The slow whitenings of the paper as it dried were fascinating to watch.
